languages.text: The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.
languages.original_text: Навигатор создает круг с радиусом 2 клетки. Каждое существо, которое находится внутри, перемещается в этот круг или начинает в нем свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, получает <u>(от {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} до {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Этот круг сохраняется на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} или до момента, когда навигатор снова применит эту способность.

traits.locale_text: Creates a 3x3 zone. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their turn in its area, suffers <u>(from 1 to 4)+(Navigator's WP bonus)</u> damage. Zone remains for 3 rounds or until the Navigator casts it again.

The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

Creates a 3×3 zone. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the area, suffers {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} damage. The zone remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator casts it again.

Creates a 3×3 zone. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the area, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The zone remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

languages.text: Навигатор создает круг с радиусом 2 клетки. Каждое существо, которое находится внутри, перемещается в этот круг или начинает в нем свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, получает <u>(от {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} до {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

traits.locale_text: Навигатор создает область 3×3. Каждое существо, которое находится внутри, перемещается в эту область или начинает в ней свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, получает <u>((от 1 до 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ навигатора)</u> урона. Эта область сохраняется на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} или до момента, когда навигатор снова применит эту способность.

Навигатор создает область 3×3. Каждое существо, которое находится внутри, перемещается в эту область или начинает в ней свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, получает <u>((от 1 до 4) + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ навигатора)</u> урона. Эта область сохраняется на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} или до момента, когда навигатор снова применит эту способность.

Навигатор создает область 3×3. Каждое существо, которое находится внутри, перемещается в эту область или начинает в ней свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, получает {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} урона. Эта область сохраняется на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} или до момента, когда навигатор снова применит эту способность.

languages.text: 导航者创建一片半径为2格的圆形区域。所有身处此区域、进入此区域，或是{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时位于其中的生物，都会受到<u>{uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此区域会持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}，或直到导航者再次施放为止。
languages.original_text: The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

创建一片3×3的区域。所有身处此区域、进入此区域，或是{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时位于其中的生物，都会受到{uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}点伤害。此区域会持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}，或直到导航者再次施放为止。

创建一片3×3的区域。所有身处此区域、进入此区域，或是{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时位于其中的生物，都会受到<u>{uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此区域会持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}，或直到导航者再次施放为止。

languages.text: El Navegante crea n círculo con un radio de 2 casillas. Toda criatura que esté dentro de este círculo, que entre en él o que empiece su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en él sufre <u>(de {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} a {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. El círculo permanece activo durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} o hasta que el Navegante vuelva a crearlo.
languages.original_text: The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

traits.locale_text: El Navegante crea n círculo con un radio de 2 casillas. Toda criatura que esté dentro de este círculo, que entre en él o que empiece su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en él sufre <u>(de {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} a {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. El círculo permanece activo durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} o hasta que el Navegante vuelva a crearlo.

Crea una zona de 3×3. Toda criatura que esté dentro de esta zona, que entre en ella o que empiece su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en ella sufre {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} de daño. La zona permanece activa durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} o hasta que el navegante vuelva a crearla.

languages.text: Der Navigator erzeugt einen Kreis mit einem Radius von 2 Feldern. Jede Kreatur, die sich in diesem Kreis befindet, ihn betritt oder ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} darin beginnt, erleidet <u>({uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} bis {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Der Kreis bleibt 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} oder bis zur Erzeugung eines neuen Kreises durch den Navigator bestehen.
languages.original_text: The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

traits.locale_text: Der Navigator erzeugt einen Kreis mit einem Radius von 2 Feldern. Jede Kreatur, die sich in diesem Kreis befindet, ihn betritt oder ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} darin beginnt, erleidet <u>({uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} bis {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Der Kreis bleibt 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} oder bis zur Erzeugung eines neuen Kreises durch den Navigator bestehen.

Erschafft eine 3×3-Zone. Jede Kreatur, die sich darin befindet, sie betritt oder ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} in diesem Gebiet beginnt, erleidet {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} Schaden. Die Zone bleibt 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang bestehen oder bis der Navigator sie erneut wirkt.

Erschafft eine 3×3-Zone. Jede Kreatur, die sich darin befindet, sie betritt oder ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} in diesem Gebiet beginnt, erleidet <u>(von {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} bis {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Die Zone bleibt 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang bestehen oder bis der Navigator sie erneut erschafft.

languages.text: Le navigateur trace un cercle d'un rayon de 2 cases. Toute créature qui s'y trouve, qui y entre ou qui y commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} subit <u>(de {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} à {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}points de dégâts{/g}. Le cercle reste actif pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} ou jusqu'à ce que le navigateur l'invoque à nouveau.
languages.original_text: The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

traits.locale_text: Le navigateur trace un cercle d'un rayon de 2 cases. Toute créature qui s'y trouve, qui y entre ou qui y commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} subit <u>(de {uip||9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} à {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}points de dégâts{/g}. Le cercle reste actif pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} ou jusqu'à ce que le navigateur l'invoque à nouveau.

Crée une zone de 3 × 3 cases. Toute créature qui s'y trouve, qui y entre ou qui y commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} subit {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} points de dégâts. La zone reste active pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} ou jusqu'à ce que le Navigateur l'invoque à nouveau.

Crée une zone de 3 × 3 cases. Toute créature qui s'y trouve, qui y entre ou qui y commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} subit <u>(de {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} à {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. La zone reste active pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} ou jusqu'à ce que le navigateur l'invoque à nouveau.

languages.text: 航宙士は半径が2セルの円を生成する。生物がその中にいるか、入るか、円の中で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始するたび、<u>({uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}～{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。この円は3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、または航宙士が再び円を生成するまで持続する。
languages.original_text: The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士は半径が2セルの円を生成する。生物がその中にいるか、入るか、円の中で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始するたび、<u>({uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}～{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。この円は3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}、または航宙士が再び円を生成するまで持続する。

3x3のゾーンを生成する。生物がその中にいるか、入るか、エリア内で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始を迎えるたび、{uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}-{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}を得る。このゾーンは3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}か、航宙士が再使用するまで持続する。

3x3のゾーンを生成する。生物がその中にいるか、入るか、エリア内で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始を迎えるたび、<u>{uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}～{uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を食らう。このゾーンは3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}か、航宙士が再び生成するまで持続する。

languages.text: Rotacı, 2 hücrelik yarıçapa sahip bir çember oluşturur. Bu çemberin içinde bulunan, içine giren veya {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} burada başlayan her yaratık ({uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} ila {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalır. Çember, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca veya Rotacı yeniden oluşturana dek kalır.
languages.original_text: The Navigator creates a circle with a 2-cell radius. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the circle, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The circle remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

traits.locale_text: Rotacı, 2 hücrelik yarıçapa sahip bir çember oluşturur. Bu çemberin içinde bulunan, içine giren veya {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} burada başlayan her yaratık ({uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} ila {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalır. Çember, 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca veya Rotacı yeniden oluşturana dek kalır.

Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the area, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The zone remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.

traits.locale_text: Creates a circular zone with radius of 2. Every creature that is in it, enters it, or begins their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in the area, suffers <u>(from {uip|MinDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6} to {uip|MaxDamage|9043cccc4e3a4aef82d86f4c46052dc6})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The zone remains for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} or until the Navigator creates it again.
